LanguageData.JRWRhabdodonReconstruct.label: Rhabdodon
LanguageData.JRWRhabdodonReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #02321-1869 [RHABDODON PRISCUS] CODENAME: FLUTE >872
A large ornithopod with a green hide and crimson stripes. A very prominent herbivore, they are seen congregating in large groups as they graze, keeping an eye out for danger.
LanguageData.JRWRhabdodonReconstruct.tools.head.label: head
